# Overview

This live-coding workshop was given to [R-Ladies Santa Barbara](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-santa-barbara/events/272478115/) via Zoom.

# Abstract 

In this code-along workshop, we review `ggplot2` basics and exploring different ways to make customizing plots fun and easy.
